definition: paragraph/section/segment/stage (of a process)/classifier for stories, periods of time, lengths of thread etc

sentences.english: It can stop suspicious nocuousness information and avoid the attack of Trojan.
sentences.chinese: 以此可以阻止懷疑的網段有害信息和防止木馬攻擊。

sentences.english: Only within Soochow University campus network, can all the following course URLs be accessed.
sentences.chinese: 以下教學資源只能在蘇州大學校園網網段內訪問。

sentences.english: Adds a city or a segment on a wide area network to your diagram.
sentences.chinese: 在網絡圖中添加城市或廣域網網段。
